short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension with misc. price tools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BunnyPrice is a small extension that aims to make online shopping just a smidge easier.

Features:

-  eBay Shipping Calculator - Instantly add the shipping of an eBay product to the price. No longer find well-priced items with $100 shipping rates!

- Amazon Price Converter - Automatically convert prices from any Amazon country to your own. Just set a base currency (which can be anything!) and select the currency data to refresh!

Amazon Price Converter currently supports the following sites:

- amazon.ca
- amazon.co.uk
- amazon.com
- amazon.co.jp
- amazon.de/fr/it/es
- amazon.com.au
- amazon.com.br
- amazon.in
- amazon.cn

This project is also open-source! Click "Website" to be taken to the GitHub repository.
